title: Sam Morril
itunes:title: Sam Morril
description:
Stand up Sam Morril is the guest this week and talks to Whitney about the time a therapist bashed a bottle over his head, Woody Allen, and his estranged dad introducing him to Lily Tomlin.  Plus, Whitney opens the show with some hot takes on Theranos and the Elizabeth Holmes verdict.  Stream Sam's specials I GOT THIS, UP ON THE ROOF, and POSITIVE INFLUENCE.  For tour dates go to https://www.sammorril.com/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Whitney Cummings | Kast Media
